properties.name: enforcer.scheduler.rate
properties.description: Fixed rate (in msec) the enforcer task is scheduled

properties.name: enforcer.auditEventRepositoryCapacity
properties.description: Number of entries stored in cirular buffer of InMemoryAuditEventRepository

properties.name: enforcer.system-hook-token
properties.description: Token used in GitLab System Hook

properties.name: gitlab.personal-access-token
properties.description: Personal access token of user with admin permission in GitLab

properties.name: gitlab.per-page
properties.description: Number of entries per response from GitLab
